full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 103 of 197 2644 LCHCmax3 Dubin - direct 1 Exhibit 249, please. Again, this is under seal and just for the witness. 2 Q. I don't know if you need that expanded or not, Dr. Dubin, 3 but we can if you need it expanded. 4 THE COURT: If they can make it a little larger. 5 MR. PAGLIUCA: Certainly, your Honor. 6 Q. Do you recognize that person, without saying the name, 7 Dr. Dubin? 8 A. I do not. 9 MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you. We can take that down. 10 THE WITNESS: Possible to have some water? 11 THE COURT: Yes. I'm sorry. 12 MR. PAGLIUCA: May I approach, your Honor? 13 MS. MOE: I can do it. 14 THE COURT: Thank you. 15 THE WITNESS: Thank you. 16 MR. PAGLIUCA: Let me know when you're ready, 17 Dr. Dubin. 18 THE WITNESS: I'm ready. 19 MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you. 20 BY MR. PAGLIUCA: 21 Q. Dr. Dubin, earlier we discussed traveling on Mr. Epstein's 22 airplanes. I want to talk about some, what have been admitted 23 as flight records with you. 24 First of all, prior to coming to court today, have you 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00014209
